description:
SecurityScorecard has uncovered a stealthy malware campaign orchestrated by North Korea’s notorious Lazarus Group. The operation, dubbed “Marstech Mayhem,” reveals the deployment of an advanced malware implant specifically designed to target cryptocurrency wallets and infiltrate the software supply chain. The campaign, which began emerging in late 2024, centres around a newly identified implant called “marstech1.”... Read more »

The post Lazarus Group infiltrates supply chain with stealthy malware appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Lazarus Group infiltrates supply chain with stealthy malware
